table.name: esg_activity
table.description: This table is used for capturing the ESG (Environment, Social and Governance) Activity details for an activity performed in OTM.

columns.name: ESG_ACTIVITY_GID
columns.description: The GID of the ESG Activity.

columns.name: ESG_ACTIVITY_XID
columns.description: The XID of the ESG Activity.

columns.name: ESG_ACTIVITY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The ID of ESG Activity Type

columns.name: SCOPE_TYPE
columns.description: Scope of the ESG Activity. Valid Values are '1','2','3'

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: DATA_SOURCE
columns.description: Source from which the ESG Activity details are obtained. Valid Values are 'GENERATED', 'INTEGRATION', 'MANUAL'.

columns.name: POSTED_ON
columns.description: The date on which the activity is posted.

columns.name: POSTING_TYPE
columns.description: Defines the posting type ESG Activity. Valid Values are 'PLANNED' and 'ACTUAL'.

columns.name: DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Data Query Type of the business object for which the ESG Activity is captured.

columns.name: OBJECT_GID
columns.description: Business Object ID for which the ESG Activity is captured.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Source Location ID for which the ESG Activity is captured.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Destination Location ID for which the ESG Activity is captured.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_MODE_GID
columns.description: Mode of the Transport used during the ESG Activity.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Equipment Type used for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: Equipment Group used for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The Transport Handling Unit ID for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Count of the Transport Handling Unit for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: DISTANCE
columns.description: Distance traveled for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the distance.

columns.name: DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: Distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight of the shipment carried for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for weight.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: Volume of the shipment carried for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CO2_EMISSION
columns.description: Amount of Carbon emitted during the activity.

columns.name: CO2_EMISSION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for CO2 emissions.

columns.name: CO2_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: CO2 emissions in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CO2_EQ_EMISSION
columns.description: Amount of Carbon equivalent gases emitted during the activity.

columns.name: CO2_EQ_EMISSION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for CO2 equivalent emissions.

columns.name: CO2_EQ_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: CO2 equivalent emissions in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: Accessorial Code ID associated with the ESG Activity.

columns.name: NOTE
columns.description: Note for the ESG Activity.

columns.name: SERVPROV_ALIAS
columns.description: Service Provider Alias of the service provider for which the ESG Activity is captured.

columns.name: ESG_ACTIVITY_RULE_GID
columns.description: The ESG Activity Rule ID used for generating this ESG Activity.

columns.name: EMISSION_RULE_GID
columns.description: The Emission Rule ID used for calculating the emissions for this ESG Activity.
